Wisdom: مَنْ أُعْطِيَ الدُّعَاءَ لَمْ يُحْرَمِ الْإِجَابَةَ
enWisdom: One who is given the [opportunity of] supplication will not be deprived of the response

Wisdom: مَنْ قَرَعَ بَابَ اللَّهِ فُتِحَ لَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever knocks on the door of Allah, it is opened for him
Whoever calls upon [and supplicates to] Allah, He answers him
The intercessor is the wing of the seeker [which helps him attain what he seeks]
The sincere one is worthy of getting [his prayers] answered

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِإِخْلَاصِ الدُّعَاءِ فَإِنَّهُ أَخْلَقُ بِالْإِجَابَةِ
enWisdom: Make your supplication sincere, for this makes it more worthy of a response

Wisdom: إِذَا كَانَتْ لَكَ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ حَاجَةٌ فَابْدَأْ بِالصَّلَاةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ص ثُمَّ اسْأَلِ اللَّهَ حَاجَتَكَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ تَعَالَى أَكْرَمُ مِنْ أَنْ يُسْأَلَ حَاجَتَيْنِ فَيَقْضِيَ إِحْدَاهُمَا وَيَمْنَعَ الْأُخْرَى
enWisdom: When you have any need [that you wish for] from Allah, the Glorified, then start by sending salutations on the Prophet (s) and then ask Allah for your need, for Allah, the Most High, is too generous to fulfil one of the two supplications that are made to Him and refuse the other
One who asks properly is aided

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَدَامَ قَرْعَ الْبَابِ وَلَجَّ وَلَجَ
enWisdom: One who continues knocking the door insistently [eventually] enters through it
How good a supporter of supplication submissiveness!
The most piercing arrow is the supplication of the oppressed

Wisdom: إِنَّ دَعْوَةَ الْمَظْلُومِ مُجَابَةٌ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لِأَنَّهُ يَطْلُبُ حَقَّهُ وَاللَّهُ تَعَالَى أَعْدَلُ [مِنْ‏] أَنْ يَمْنَعَ ذَا حَقٍّ حَقَّهُ
enWisdom: Verily the cry of the oppressed is answered by Allah, the Glorified, because he is asking for his right, and Allah is far greater than that He should deny a person his right

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي الْمُنَاجَاةِ إِلَّا لِرَجُلَيْنِ عَالِمٌ نَاطِقٌ أَوْ مُسْتَمِعٌ وَاعٍ
enWisdom: There is no good in secret conversation except for two people: the articulating scholar or the cautious listener [who can keep secrets]
